name: Super Terminal Rush
description:
Super Terminal Rush is a 48 hour jam game for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2018 Jam. It is based on the theme GENRE but without the MECHANIC. I took the genre Shoot 'em Up and took away the shooting and the tight dodging.

Click to move.
Press Enter to Restart.
Move through enemies to damage them.
Don't get hit by stuff.
Chain multiple hits to get a higher score.

Don't mind the score bug. I left out an important line of code. >.<
